p:
Free fatty acids (FFAs) measurements. The amount of FFAs expressed as oleic acid percentages was determined by Egan et al. method.
18 For this purpose, 0.50 g of fish oil was extracted and dissolved in 50 mL of solvent (a mixture of equal volume of 96% ethanol and ethyl ether; Merck Millipore). Then, the solution was titrated with 0.10 N. NaOH (Merck Millipore). The amount of FFAs was calculated according to the following equation:
